overview: "Written, directed, edited and acted by Elliot Passantino, this semi sequel to his 2014 film was made entirely in quarantine during the Codv-19 pandemic. All characters by Elliot while beings safely at home or on location away from all humans. Featuring the music of Jonny Pakalololo, Aaron Kinsman and animation by Elliot Passantino John Healy. A fun B movie comedy to inspire"
tagline: (The First American Movie Shot in Quarantine)
title: Unicorn Sky 2 : Midnight Ghosts
